meaningMnemonic: If you follow the <kanji>circumference</kanji> of a <kanji>period of time</kanji>, you end up back at the beginning and it makes a full <vocabulary>cycle</vocabulary>. Events in history always repeat, right?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
